本帖最后由 $$$$$$$$$$$$$$$ 于 2020-4-16 22:02 编辑 

尝试降级暮色，我记得2.3.7版本确实崩服问题多，换成2.3.3试试：http://mc18.top:90/twilightforest-1.7.10-2.3.3.jar

崩服因为https://www.mcmod.cn/item/tab/3825.html这个树木崩的

replies.author: kongkong7
replies.txt_content:
暮色本身就有问题  可以 尝试修改配置文件试试
找到config里面的   TwilightForest.cfg
然后找到这个两个替换成如下配置
performance {
    # Amount of canopy coverage, from 0.0 on up.  Lower numbers improve chunk generation speed at the cost of a thinner forest.
    D:CanopyCoverage=0.1

    # Chance that a chunk in the Twilight Forest will contain a twilight oak tree.  Higher numbers reduce the number of trees, increasing performance.
    I:TwilightOakChance=1000
}
